snippet.title: TheC64 Collection 3 - Evercade Cartridge Tour
snippet.description:
Captured directly from the Evercade VS.
Yet another collection of Commdore 64 games that is a mix of Hewson Consultants and Epyx releases... except we get the all-time classic, Boulder Dash. This video also shows you a bonus in form of a cart combo game!

Games in this cart:
00:00:18 - Anarchy
00:07:01 - Boulder Dash
00:10:58 - Break Dance
00:19:01 - Cyberdyne Warrior
00:21:00 - Cybernoid II: The Revenge
00:24:01 - Deliverance: Stormlord II
00:27:10 - Exolon
00:30:00 - Heavy Metal Paradroid
00:35:33 - Jumpman Junior
00:40:22 - Netherworld
00:44:39 - Street Sports Soccer
00:48:50 - Summer Games II
00:54:05 - Super Cycle

BONUS!
00:57:30 - Zynaps [TheC64 Collection 2 + TheC64 Collection 3]

Boulder Dash (C) BBG Entertainment
Other games belong to their respective IP owners
